definition: Steven (name)/Simon Stevin (1548-1620), Flemish engineer and mathematician, played a key role in introducing the decimal system to Europe
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Robert Louis Stevenson (novelist), author of Treasure Island 金銀島|金银岛[Jin1 yin2 Dao3]
pinyin: Luo2 bo2 te4 · Lu4 yi4 si1 · Si1 di4 wen2 sen1
containing_words.word: 罗伯特·路易斯·斯蒂文森

sentences.english: Dr. Stevens has worked in thelanguage institute since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂文专士从1982年起便正在道话教院管事。

sentences.english: North Kesteven council is keen to build more straw homes.
sentences.chinese: 北斯蒂文当局是想建立更多的稻草屋。

sentences.english: One the the lifetime honorees for 2012 was George Stevens Jnr.
sentences.chinese: 2012年终身获奖者的得主是乔治斯蒂文斯。

sentences.english: Darrell Stevenson, left, is an American cowboy and cattle rancher.
sentences.chinese: 达雷尔斯蒂文森，左，是美国牛仔和牛牧场主。

sentences.english: My God, Steve. Have you ever been in a fight in your life?
sentences.chinese: 我的上帝，斯蒂文。你进行过任何一场格斗么？

sentences.english: "Steven got a cut inside his inner ear, " revealed Hodgson.
sentences.chinese: “斯蒂文的内耳有着一个创口，”霍奇森透露到。

sentences.english: Steve took my schoolbag and put it in a tree.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂文拿走我的书包放在了一棵树上。

sentences.english: Let's show our pictures to Jim and Steven.
sentences.chinese: 咱们把画给金和斯蒂文看看吧。

sentences.english: Steven has held the office of the CFO for more than two years.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂文担任首席财务官一职有两年多了。

sentences.english: The muscles in her stomach rival Steve's and flex as she breathes.
sentences.chinese: 她的腹肌比的上斯蒂文，当她呼吸时腹肌就会绷起。
